metadata.title: DialogTab | Conversational Commerce on WhatsApp
metadata.description: DialogTab is a conversational commerce platform that automates receiving your order or guidance to your user a product via WhatsApp.
metadata.keywords: WhatsApp Business API, conversational commerce, e-commerce, chatbot, multi-agent, WhatsApp sales

solutionsItems.title: Omnichannel Inbox
solutionsItems.desc: WhatsApp, Instagram, Facebook & more in one place

solutionsItems.title: Multi-Agent Support

industryContent.description: DialogTab unites WhatsApp, Instagram, Messenger, and Live Chat in one inbox, saving your team hours of repetitive work and ensures no conversation is ever lost

Turn WhatsApp into your most powerful e-commerce sales channel. Automate abandoned cart recovery, manage orders in real time, and deliver personalized product recommendations — all from a unified omnichannel inbox integrated with Shopify, WooCommerce, and more

Streamline travel reservations, send instant booking confirmations, and handle inquiries 24/7. Automate itinerary updates, check-in reminders, and multilingual traveler support across WhatsApp, Instagram, and all messaging channels

From reservation to checkout, deliver five-star guest communication at scale. Automate booking confirmations, room service requests, and real-time concierge support via WhatsApp and every messaging platform your guests prefer

Accelerate test drive bookings, service appointments, and vehicle inquiries through messaging. Automate lead follow-ups, send service reminders, and provide instant vehicle specs and pricing via WhatsApp and all your customer channels

hero.partnerBadge: Official WhatsApp Business Partner trusted by businesses worldwide

videoSection.title: See DialogTab in action
videoSection.description: Watch how DialogTab helps teams deliver exceptional customer experiences across all channels.

considerItDone.title: Consider it done
considerItDone.description: Our omnichannel inbox and AI & Automation help teams to deliver delightful customer conversations.
considerItDone.aiDescription: AI Agents and AI Journeys can relieve your team, by answering more than 80% of your repetitive conversations.
considerItDone.inboxDescription: Centralise your channels, including customer favourites like WhatsApp, customer info and helpful automation features.
considerItDone.journeysTitle: Let customer experiences flow with AI Journeys
considerItDone.journeysDescription: AI asks visitors questions to collect important info, leads them to the right person or answers straight away. Ideal customer journeys are now only a few clicks away.

footer.brandDescription: Conversational commerce platform for WhatsApp Business API. Automate sales, support & engagement across all messaging channels.
footer.whatsappPartner: DialogTab is an official WhatsApp Business Solution Provider. All trademarks belong to their respective owners.

meta.title: WhatsApp for E-Commerce & Retail | DialogTab
meta.description: Boost your e-commerce sales with WhatsApp Business API. Automate abandoned cart recovery, order management, product recommendations and customer support — all from one omnichannel inbox.
meta.keywords: WhatsApp e-commerce, WhatsApp Business API retail, abandoned cart recovery WhatsApp, WhatsApp order management, Shopify WhatsApp, WooCommerce WhatsApp, e-commerce chatbot

hero.title: Turn WhatsApp into your #1
hero.description: Recover abandoned carts, manage orders, and send personalized product recommendations — all through WhatsApp. DialogTab integrates with Shopify, WooCommerce, and IKAS to create a seamless shopping experience.

features.title: Abandoned Cart Recovery
features.description: Automatically send WhatsApp reminders to customers who left items in their cart. Recover up to 35% of lost revenue with personalized messages and direct checkout links.

features.title: Order Management via WhatsApp
features.description: Create, track, and update orders directly in WhatsApp conversations. Send automated order confirmations, shipping updates, and delivery notifications.

features.title: Product Catalog & Search
features.description: Share product cards, search inventory in real-time, and identify products from customer-sent images. Your entire catalog accessible through chat.

features.title: Multi-Agent Sales Team
features.description: Multiple sales agents can handle conversations simultaneously from one WhatsApp number. Auto-assign leads based on availability, skill, or product category.

features.title: Shopify & WooCommerce Integration
features.description: Sync your product catalog, inventory, and orders in real-time. Manage everything from a single dashboard without switching between platforms.

features.title: AI-Powered Customer Support
features.description: Let AI handle up to 80% of repetitive questions — order status, return policies, product info. Your team focuses on high-value conversations.

items.title: Cart Recovery Automation
items.description: Send timely WhatsApp reminders with product images and one-click checkout links to recover abandoned carts.

items.title: Post-Purchase Updates
items.description: Automatically notify customers about order confirmation, shipping status, and delivery updates via WhatsApp.

items.title: Product Recommendations
items.description: Use AI to analyze purchase history and send personalized product suggestions that drive repeat sales.

items.title: VIP Customer Engagement
items.description: Create segmented campaigns for loyal customers with early access to sales, exclusive offers, and personalized outreach.

cta.title: Ready to boost your e-commerce sales?
cta.description: Join hundreds of online stores using DialogTab to sell more through WhatsApp.

meta.title: WhatsApp for Travel & Tourism | DialogTab
meta.description: Manage travel bookings, send itinerary updates, and provide 24/7 traveler support through WhatsApp Business API. Automate reservations and multilingual communication.
meta.keywords: WhatsApp travel agency, WhatsApp Business tourism, travel booking WhatsApp, itinerary updates WhatsApp, hotel reservation WhatsApp, tour operator chatbot

hero.title: Effortless travel bookings via
hero.description: Manage reservations, send real-time itinerary updates, and provide 24/7 multilingual traveler support — all from a single omnichannel inbox that your travel team loves.

features.title: Booking Management
features.description: Handle reservation requests, confirmations, and modifications directly through WhatsApp. Reduce no-shows with automated reminder messages.

features.title: Real-Time Itinerary Updates
features.description: Send flight changes, hotel check-in details, and tour schedule updates instantly via WhatsApp. Keep travelers informed at every step.

features.title: 24/7 Multilingual Support
features.description: AI-powered chatbot handles common travel questions in multiple languages around the clock — from visa requirements to local recommendations.

features.title: Group Travel Coordination
features.description: Manage group bookings, share itineraries, and coordinate logistics through organized WhatsApp conversations with team assignment.

features.title: Automated Check-in Reminders
features.description: Send timely check-in reminders, boarding pass links, and pre-arrival information to reduce friction in the travel experience.

features.title: Post-Trip Feedback Collection
features.description: Automatically request reviews and feedback after trips. Use conversational surveys via WhatsApp for higher response rates.

items.title: Instant Booking Confirmations
items.description: Automatically send booking confirmations with all details — dates, locations, prices — directly to the traveler's WhatsApp.

items.title: Flight & Schedule Alerts
items.description: Notify travelers immediately about flight changes, delays, or gate updates through WhatsApp for real-time awareness.

items.title: Personalized Travel Recommendations
items.description: Use AI to suggest tours, restaurants, and activities based on traveler preferences and destination data.

items.title: Emergency Support Channel
items.description: Provide a direct WhatsApp line for travel emergencies — cancellations, rebookings, and urgent assistance available 24/7.

cta.title: Ready to transform your travel operations?
cta.description: Join travel agencies and tour operators using DialogTab to deliver seamless traveler experiences.

meta.title: WhatsApp for Hospitality & Restaurants | DialogTab
meta.description: Deliver five-star guest communication through WhatsApp Business API. Automate reservations, room service requests, and real-time concierge support for hotels and restaurants.
meta.keywords: WhatsApp hotel communication, WhatsApp Business hospitality, restaurant reservation WhatsApp, concierge WhatsApp, guest messaging platform, hotel chatbot

hero.title: Five-star guest experience with
hero.description: From reservation to checkout, deliver exceptional guest communication at scale. Automate booking confirmations, room service, and concierge support — all via the messaging channels your guests already use.

features.title: Reservation Management
features.description: Accept, confirm, and modify restaurant and hotel reservations through WhatsApp. Send automated reminders to reduce no-shows by up to 45%.

features.title: Digital Concierge Service
features.description: Provide instant answers to guest questions — Wi-Fi passwords, spa hours, local recommendations — 24/7 via AI-powered WhatsApp concierge.

features.title: Room Service & Orders
features.description: Let guests order room service, request amenities, or report issues directly through WhatsApp. Streamline operations with auto-routing to the right department.

features.title: Guest Feedback & Reviews
features.description: Automatically collect feedback during and after stays through conversational WhatsApp surveys. Address issues in real-time before they become negative reviews.

features.title: Multi-Property Management
features.description: Manage guest communication across multiple locations from one unified inbox. Standardize service quality while allowing local customization.

features.title: Upselling & Promotions
features.description: Send personalized offers for room upgrades, spa packages, and dining specials based on guest preferences and booking history.

items.title: Pre-Arrival Communication
items.description: Send welcome messages with check-in details, parking info, and special requests confirmation before guests arrive.

items.title: In-Stay Service Requests
items.description: Let guests request extra towels, room service, or maintenance through WhatsApp — routed automatically to the right staff.

items.title: Restaurant Table Management
items.description: Handle reservation requests, waitlist updates, and menu inquiries through WhatsApp for a seamless dining experience.

items.title: Post-Stay Loyalty Programs
items.description: Engage guests after checkout with personalized offers, loyalty rewards, and exclusive return-visit promotions via WhatsApp.

cta.title: Ready to elevate your guest experience?
cta.description: Join hotels and restaurants using DialogTab to deliver exceptional guest communication.

meta.title: WhatsApp for Automotive | DialogTab
meta.description: Accelerate automotive sales and service with WhatsApp Business API. Automate test drive bookings, service reminders, lead follow-ups, and vehicle inquiries through conversational commerce.
meta.keywords: WhatsApp automotive, WhatsApp Business car dealership, test drive booking WhatsApp, automotive chatbot, car sales WhatsApp, service reminder WhatsApp, vehicle inquiry

hero.title: Drive automotive sales with
hero.description: From test drive bookings to service appointments, manage every customer interaction through WhatsApp. Automate lead follow-ups, send vehicle specs, and close deals faster with conversational commerce.

features.title: Test Drive Scheduling
features.description: Let customers book test drives directly through WhatsApp. Send confirmations, reminders, and follow-up messages automatically to maximize show-up rates.

features.title: Vehicle Inquiry Management
features.description: Share vehicle specs, photos, pricing, and availability instantly through WhatsApp. AI answers common questions while agents handle serious buyers.

features.title: Service Appointment Booking
features.description: Automate service scheduling, send maintenance reminders, and provide real-time updates on repair status via WhatsApp.

features.title: Lead Follow-Up Automation
features.description: Never lose a lead. Automatically follow up with prospects who showed interest, send personalized vehicle recommendations based on their preferences.

features.title: Multi-Dealership Management
features.description: Manage customer conversations across multiple dealerships from one inbox. Route inquiries to the nearest location or most suitable sales agent.

features.title: After-Sales Communication
features.description: Keep customers engaged with service reminders, recall notifications, warranty updates, and trade-in opportunities through WhatsApp.

items.title: New Vehicle Launch Campaigns
items.description: Send targeted WhatsApp campaigns for new model launches with specs, pricing, and instant test drive booking to interested customers.

items.title: Service Reminder Automation
items.description: Automatically notify customers when their vehicle is due for service, oil change, or tire rotation — with one-click appointment booking.

items.title: Trade-In & Upgrade Offers
items.description: Reach existing customers with personalized trade-in valuations and upgrade offers based on their vehicle age and service history.

items.title: Real-Time Repair Updates
items.description: Keep customers informed about their vehicle's repair progress with automated WhatsApp updates at each stage of the service process.

cta.title: Ready to accelerate your automotive business?
cta.description: Join dealerships and service centers using DialogTab to drive more sales through WhatsApp.

meta.title: WhatsApp for Energy & Utilities | DialogTab
meta.description: Streamline energy and utilities customer communication with WhatsApp Business API. Automate billing support, outage notifications, meter readings, and service requests.
meta.keywords: WhatsApp energy utilities, WhatsApp Business utilities, billing support WhatsApp, outage notification WhatsApp, utility customer service, energy chatbot

hero.title: Streamline utility operations with
hero.description: Automate billing inquiries, outage notifications, and service requests through WhatsApp. Reduce call center volume while delivering faster, more convenient customer service.

features.title: Billing & Payment Support
features.description: Send billing notifications, payment reminders, and digital invoices via WhatsApp. Enable customers to check balances and make payments through chat.

features.title: Outage Notifications
features.description: Proactively notify affected customers about planned and unplanned outages. Provide real-time restoration updates to reduce inbound calls.

features.title: Meter Reading Submissions
features.description: Allow customers to submit meter readings through WhatsApp with photo verification. Simplify the process and improve accuracy.

features.title: Service Request Management
features.description: Handle new connections, disconnections, plan changes, and maintenance requests through WhatsApp with automated routing and tracking.

features.title: Energy Usage Insights
features.description: Send personalized energy consumption reports and savings tips via WhatsApp. Help customers manage their usage and reduce costs.

features.title: AI-Powered Self-Service
features.description: Let AI handle common queries — tariff information, connection status, bill explanations — reducing call center workload by up to 60%.

items.title: Automated Billing Reminders
items.description: Send payment due date reminders with bill amounts and one-click payment links to reduce late payments.

items.title: Proactive Outage Communication
items.description: Instantly notify customers in affected areas about outages with estimated restoration times and progress updates.

items.title: New Connection Onboarding
items.description: Guide new customers through the connection process via WhatsApp with step-by-step instructions and document collection.

items.title: Energy Savings Programs
items.description: Engage customers with personalized energy-saving tips, solar panel offers, and smart meter information through WhatsApp campaigns.

cta.title: Ready to modernize your customer communication?
cta.description: Join energy companies using DialogTab to deliver efficient, digital-first customer service.

meta.title: WhatsApp for Financial Services | DialogTab
meta.description: Deliver secure, compliant customer communication for financial services through WhatsApp Business API. Automate account notifications, support inquiries, and personalized financial guidance.
meta.keywords: WhatsApp financial services, WhatsApp Business banking, secure messaging finance, account notification WhatsApp, fintech chatbot, insurance WhatsApp

hero.title: Secure financial communication via
hero.description: Meet your SLA and customer expectations with secure, compliant messaging. Automate account notifications, support inquiries, and personalized financial guidance through the channels your customers prefer.

features.title: Account Notifications
features.description: Send real-time transaction alerts, balance updates, and payment confirmations securely via WhatsApp. Keep customers informed and reduce fraud risk.

features.title: Secure Document Exchange
features.description: Share statements, policy documents, and forms through encrypted WhatsApp messages. Simplify paperwork while maintaining security compliance.

features.title: Loan & Application Tracking
features.description: Keep applicants updated on their loan, credit card, or insurance application status with automated WhatsApp updates at each stage.

features.title: AI Financial Assistant
features.description: Let AI handle common queries — account balances, branch locations, interest rates, policy details — while agents focus on complex advisory services.

features.title: Appointment Scheduling
features.description: Allow customers to book appointments with financial advisors, relationship managers, or branch visits directly through WhatsApp.

features.title: Compliance & Audit Trail
features.description: Maintain complete conversation logs for regulatory compliance. All interactions are recorded and searchable for audit purposes.

items.title: Transaction Alerts & Fraud Prevention
items.description: Send instant transaction notifications and enable customers to quickly confirm or report suspicious activity via WhatsApp.

items.title: Insurance Claim Updates
items.description: Keep policyholders informed about claim status, document requirements, and settlement updates through automated WhatsApp messages.

items.title: Loan Application Journey
items.description: Guide applicants through the loan process via WhatsApp — from initial inquiry to document submission to approval notification.

items.title: Personalized Financial Guidance
items.description: Send targeted investment insights, savings opportunities, and product recommendations based on customer profiles and financial goals.

cta.title: Ready to transform your financial communication?
cta.description: Join financial institutions using DialogTab to deliver secure, efficient customer service.
